comment.body: Will this be live streamed? I don't live within driving distance of California.

> [jayofthezero](#comment_1_16nArdxrSaNThNp83kL8E6NLL9WD98iUne): Will this be live streamed? I don't live within driving distance of California.

Did some digging for myself, and yes, the event will be live streamed, though not sure if this specifically will be.
At this rate you'll need a vacation from your vacation.
